title: Adding a contact, adding a income photo
answer:
1. Adding a contact   
 Open the contact>adding a contact icon on the downright corner > select the store type,   
 enter into contact adding screen> input the contact information> back/complete

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926090041566001.png)  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926090050859001.png)   ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926090146966001.png)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926090657440001.png)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926090728516001.png)  

2AAdding a income photo   
 Note: not supporting SIM contacts to add income photo   
 Method 1: contacts list> open the contact details screen> press the contactfs head sculpture>   
 take a photo or select from the gallery;   
 Method 2: open the contact details screen> menu> modifying, enter into the edit screen>   
 press the contactfs head sculpture> take a photo or select from the gallery;

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926090750398001.png)  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140926090759609001.png)
